text: Ștefan Marinel Vlădoiu (born 28 December 1998) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a defender for CS Universitatea Craiova. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:CS Universitatea Craiova players Category:FC Dunărea Călărași players Category:Liga II players Category:CS Sportul Snagov players
title: Ștefan Vlădoiu
